item.title: Simplified Sales Tax Part 2
item.description:
This post clarifies how inventory impacts sales tax calculations in Sales Order and Purchase Order Processing. We’ll build upon the three-step tax calculation process from the previous post: Document Default, Line Item Default, and Tax Schedule Comparison. While still called a “document” default, the Shipping Method and Site information influencing the default tax schedule is actually stored by line item because they can differ. For example, in Sales Order Processing, a “Shipping Method Delivery” would default to the tax schedule associated with the Customer’s Ship To Address, while “Shipping Method Pickup” defaults to the Site’s tax schedule...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/simplified-sales-tax-part-2/
